name: Feelfree Move Kayak
description: FeelFree’s smallest sit-on-top provides access to big days out exploring lakes, rivers, ponds, estuaries, and inlets. Part of their Touring Tri Hull Line, it’s made with an emphasis on stability and tracking.Moulded handles.Wheel in the keel makes for very easy carries to and from the water.Bow hatch for storage.Padded seat with backrest.Cargo holding bungi cord in stern.Drain plug.
